page.title: 08Golspie Fire Station.
page.content: Golspie Fire Station was built in 1976.Before that the fire engine used to be housed in a garage in Seaforth Rd.The new building is modern.It has an area to house the fire-engine,a lecture room,kitchen and toilets. There are nine part-time firemen, each of them have another full-time job,and a sub-officer based at the station. Each fireman is supplied with a bleeper and when there is a fire, each man's bleeper goes off.Before the firemen were issued with bleepers,a siren used to go off and it could be heard all over the village. Every Tuesday night the firemen attend lectures and practise routines at the fire station. Most calls are to chimney fires and heath fires.
